1991 NBA Playoffs Summary

1990 Playoffs Summary 1992 Playoffs Summary

League Champion: Chicago Bulls

Finals MVP: Michael Jordan (31.2 / 6.6 / 11.4)


1991 Playoff Leaders:

PTS: Michael Jordan (529)

TRB: Dennis Rodman (177)

AST: Magic Johnson (240)

WS: Michael Jordan (4.8)
